This made me so angry, besides it taking me about a month and a half to download; I open it and for some dumb reason after I read everyone's comments, I was hoping it would all be in Japanese with English subs. But no It's all in English with very obnoxious and inaccurate dubs. Fuck this torrent.

Maybe you should have read the comments better, WalrusMongler.
And the file info might have helped you, too.

Before you start whining, take a moment to actually read more than 3 or 4 words.

Anyway, I found the dubs to be accurate enough; it's sometimes a pain to have to read the subtitles, anyway. I'll DL an English dub of the 3rd OVA from another torrent, I think.

you know people, these files are mkv and ogm format, that means that if you spent the time to go into your filters and select the secondary audio stream and turn on the subtitles you could watch it subbed. honestly why the hell do you think the fandom started using those formats in the first place. its because they support multiple audio streams and the standard formats dont

Everything is here. Except for the very last episode of OVA 3, called Final Confrontation. I haven't watched all of it yet, but i'm pretty sure it's not there since it was technically a "special". Sucks cause this episode ties up the entire story. Someone prove me wrong or show me a place to download it. It is on youtube though...

As far as an order to watch them....
-OVA file which has ova 1 ((watch movie Daughter of Darkness after episode 6))and 2
-OVA 3
-GXP
-Universe
-The other 2 movies
-Tokyo
-Mihoshi Special
-Sammy
I take back the Daughter of Darkness comment. Watch all 3 movies after Universe. >_
